item.title: Bibimap
item.description: Ingredients Meat 100g meat 1 tbsp soy sauce 1 tbsp sesame oil 1 tsp sugar ¼ tsp minced garlic Sauce 2 tbsp gochujang/doenjang 1 tbsp sesame oil 1 tbsp brown sugar 1 tbsp water 1 tbsp roasted sesame seeds 1 tsp vinegar 1 tsp minced garlic Veges (pick whats in season) mushrooms daikon carrots courgettes cucumber bean sprouts steamed rice seaweed

item.title: Black Rice & Edamame Salad
item.description: prep 20mins cook 45mins rest 120mins serves 8 credit - Amelia Ingredients 1 cup raw black rice 1 packet frozen Edamame soya shelled beans 1 cup currants ½ cup pinenuts - roasted (optional) Dressing 3 tbsp sesame oil 3 tbsp soya sauce 2 cloves garlic - crushed 1 tsp ginger - grated 4 kaffir leaves - finely chopped 1 red chilli seeds removed- finely chopped black pepper Prep Cook rice until nutty texture; don’t overcook.
